seo.title: Kling 2.5 Turbo ‚Äì Text & Image to Video
seo.description: Route Kling 2.5 Turbo through MaxVideoAI and switch between Pro text, Pro image, or Standard image-to-video tiers without leaving the workspace.

hero.title: Kling 2.5 Turbo ‚Äì Text or Image to Video
hero.intro: Draft cinematic clips from a prompt, animate a single still, or drop to the Standard tier for budget-friendly loops. One card exposes every Kling 2.5 Turbo variant so you can decide per render without juggling endpoints.

overview: Kling 2.5 Turbo brings Kuaishou's realistic motion system into the same prompt lab as Sora and Veo. Spin up 5‚Äì10 second hero shots, animate uploaded portraits with the Pro image tier, or switch to the Standard mode when you need dozens of social loops without blowing the budget.

bestUseCases.title: Best use cases
items: Hero product beats that need camera polish without Sora timing
Reference-driven portrait animation for founders or talent
Budget-friendly B-roll or mood loops using the Standard tier
Cinematic teasers for TikTok/Reels where 5‚Äì10s cadence matters

technicalOverview.label: Duration
technicalOverview.body: 5 or 10 second renders with fixed timing

technicalOverview.label: Aspect ratios
technicalOverview.body: 16:9, 9:16, or 1:1 across text and image runs

technicalOverview.label: Inputs
technicalOverview.body: Freeform prompt or a single JPG/PNG/WEBP reference for Pro/Standard image-to-video

technicalOverview.label: Pricing
technicalOverview.body: $0.35 per 5s in Pro, $0.21 per 5s in Standard image mode

promptStructure.title: Prompt structure
promptStructure.quote: Cinematic dolly shot of two cars launching off the line at dusk, volumetric haze, dramatic lighting, shallow depth of field, 24fps.
promptStructure.description: Keep the directions cinematic and structured:
steps: Spell out the primary camera move (dolly, handheld sway, drone arc)
Call out lens or lighting cues to lock the mood
Set the pacing (slow motion, whip-pan, seamless loop)
For image‚Üívideo, remind Kling what needs to stay untouched

tips.title: Tips & tricks
items: ‚≠ê Use Pro Image when every stitch of wardrobe needs to hold up on a hero shot

prompts.title: Fashion hero
prompts.prompt: Slow push-in on a model in a mirrored set, neon rim lights, fabric billowing in gentle wind, 35mm lens.

prompts.title: Portrait remix
prompts.prompt: Animate the uploaded founder portrait into a confident walk-and-talk moment, golden hour backlight, handheld sway.

faqs.q: What‚Äôs the difference between Pro and Standard?
faqs.a: Pro modes (text and image) prioritise fidelity and motion nuance. Standard image-to-video runs inside the same card but lowers cost and render time for higher volume loops.

faqs.q: Can I upload more than one image?
faqs.a: Kling accepts one image per render. Merge reference angles into a single board if you need more context and describe the camera path clearly.
No. Renders are silent so they fit any edit. Layer music/VO in MaxVideoAI or pair the brief with Sora 2 Pro when you need native dialogue.

pricingNotes: Check the Price-Before chip before each run: $0.35 per 5s on Pro tiers and $0.21 per 5s on Standard image-to-video.
